Spectre UI for Astro

Build better websites faster

A design system integration that brings Spectre UI components to your Astro projects.

Components

Buttons

Flexible button components with multiple variants, sizes, and states.

Cards New

Use cards to group related UI content. Cards automatically adapt to Spectre's surface and text tokens for proper contrast.

Inputs

Form controls with labels, validation states, and helper text.

Display status, labels, or counts with different variants.
